spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room adjacencies are correct. However, door placement for the bathroom and the small storage/closet area are slightly misaligned compared to the 2D plan. The windows on the living room wall are simplified/consolidated.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to structural constraints. Roof is removed, all rooms are present, and there are no text labels or measurement lines. Minor deduction for the thickness of the external patio wall which deviates from the plan's thin line.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is accurately placed in block-style. Kitchen island, stove, dining table, sofa, and bed all match the 2D layout. The scale is consistent throughout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect execution of the low-poly style. Flat shading, neutral background, isometric orthographic camera, and no realistic textures or photorealism.

detected_errors.description: Internal door for the bathroom and hallway storage are slightly misplaced/resized compared to the 2D blueprint.
Windows on the bottom-most wall are represented as four separate units whereas the plan suggest a more continuous or differently spaced glazing pattern.
